In a previous study , we demonstrated that bufalin , which is an active principle of Chinese medicine , chan'su , caused apoptosis in human leukemia U937 cells by anomalous activation of mitogen - activated protein kinase ( MAPK ) via the signaling pathway of Ras , <extra_id_0> Raf-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , and <extra_id_0> MAPK kinase-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
Here , we report the effect of overexpression of <extra_id_0> bcl-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in U937 cells on the signaling pathway of apoptosis that is induced by bufalin .
